alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 9:11AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 degrees. * WHERE...Assumption, St. James, St. John The Baptist, Upper Lafourche and Upper Terrebonne Parishes. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very cold temperatures and wind chills can lead to hypothermia if proper clothing is not worn.
info.instruction: Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. While the wintry precipitation has ended, icy conditions will persist on some bridges for another few hours. Avoid travel if possible. Continue to exercise extreme caution if you must go out, especially if you have to cross any bridges.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
